txt.en: Commander Rangvald trains dwarves for battle at the fortress of Skarháld, in Ered Mithrin….\n\nYour mission is to assist Rangvald with training dwarves for war at Skarháld.
You have been tasked with assisting Rangvald with training dwarves for war at Skarháld.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'We are currently training soldiers at Skarháld. Since you are an exceptional warrior, we need you to travel to the fortress in Ered Mithrin and assist with the training of soldiers, under supervision of Rangvald. I am counting on you!'
The monster commander in this mission has an aura that buffs any allies nearby.
Your mission is to assist Rangvald with training dwarves for war at Skarháld.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to Skarháld.
'Well done! With these soldiers properly trained, we are certain to win this war!'
